amendment.description: To clarify that lobbying contacts for Congressional staff do not include seeking lobbying disclosure compliance information from the Clerk of the House of Representatives or the Secretary of the Senate.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3185 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3185 proposed by Senator Lott. (consideration: CR S2499; text: CR S2499) To clarify that lobbying contacts for Congressional staff do not include seeking lobbying disclosure compliance information from the Clerk of the House of Representatives or the Secretary of the Senate.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3185 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3185 proposed by Senator Lott.
